source-type-vocab
=================

**Court Document** (1)

    Legal document from a court case

**DOJ Press Release** (2)

    Press release from the Department of Justice or U.S. Attorneys' Office

**Investigator Notes** (3)

    Raw notes from an incident investigator

**Logs** (4)

    Technical logs from network, server, or user devices

**Media** (5)

    News, blog, or similar publication

**Organization Interview** (6)

    Direct interview with the victim organization

**Insider Interview** (7)

    Direct interview with the insider

**Other** (99)

    Other type of source not listed in this vocabulary
